title: Signal fault causing additional travel time on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] Bus bridging and free regular bus svcs have ceased.
[CCL] Train svcs have resumed. Bus bridging svc continue btwn #Bishan & #PayaLebar. Free regular bus svc are still avail at all CCL stns.
[CCL] Train svcs have resumed. Bus bridging svc avail btwn #Bishan & #PayaLebar. Free regular bus svc are still avail at all CCL stns.
[CCL] Train svcs have resumed. Bus bridging svc avail between #Bishan and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus svc are still avail at all CCL stns.
[CCL] Train svcs just resumed. Bus bridging svc avail between #Bishan and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus svc are still avail at all CCL stns.
[CCL]No train svc btwn #BotanicGardens and #Serangoon. Free regular bus svc at all CCL stns. Alt travel options:https://t.co/YpY6tCyNiW
[CCL] No train svc btwn #BotanicGardens and #Serangoon. Free regular bus svc at all CCL stns. Alt travel options: https://t.co/YpY6tCyNiW
[CCL] No train svc between #BotanicGardens and #Marymount. Free regular bus svc at all CCL stns. Alt travel options: https://t.co/YpY6tCyNiW
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time on the Circle Line due to intermittent signal fault.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time on the Circle Line due to intermittent signal fault.

[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #BotanicGardens to
  #HarbourFront due to signal fault.
[CCL]: Due to a signal fault trains are moving slower towards #HarbourFront. We are investigating the fault.

[CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared but trains and stations are crowded. Due to
  congestion, pls add 10mins travel time towards #DhobyGhaut.

[CCL]
  UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between #PasirPanjang and
  #one-north due to signal fault
